item.title: IDE options for ESP-IDF
item.description: If you want to develop on ESP32 boards with ESP-IDF there are now several applications you can use as an IDE or editor. In late 2018 I tried several of these options and here are the results so far. Surprisingly Visual Studio Code is overrepresented in this list, I was not aware of this editor up to now but arguably it is quite good. Language Server Protocol VSCode also introduced some new nomenclature in the editor world, notably the Language Server Protocol.
